alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 4:10PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Jefferson County through 445 PM EDT... At 410 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Shively, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Louisville around 415 PM EDT. Audubon Park and Parkway Village around 420 PM EDT. Lynnview, Newburg and Okolona around 425 PM EDT. Watterson Park, Seneca Gardens, Strathmoor Village, Kingsley, Poplar Hills and Strathmoor Manor around 430 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include St. Matthews, West Buechel, Buechel, Springlee, Plymouth Village, Broad Fields, Meadowview Estates and Highview. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
